title: Software Engineer
description: Building high quality full stack applications whilst maintaining existing projects to provide an exceptional health care experience.
Contributed in making architectural decisions and the technical build-out using TypeScript, React, Node.js, Emotion CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Postgres SQL.
Collaborated in a small, multi-functional team alongside other engineers, designers, and product managers, blending skills and ideas into a seamless performance.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Develop and maintain a large scale web application (shop management software) using React, PHP (Laravel), Node, Postgres, and Redis.
Implemented front-end overhaul of the App's Reporting module from design to implementation used by thousands of users.
Designed and built large scale full-stack internal Admin portal to manage thousands of accounts.
Collaborate with founding team members to deliver high-quality software solutions and contribute to all phases of the development lifecycle.
Troubleshoot, test, and maintain the core product software to ensure strong optimization and functionality.
Demonstrate keen eye for design and user experience while developing features and services.

title: Software Developer
description: Spearheaded full-stack development of Web 3 applications in an agile start-up environment.
Led UI overhaul for App, visited by tens of thousands of users, resulting in enhanced UX and positive feedback.
Developed responsive, user-friendly front-end using React, Remix.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring seamless integration with back-end systems.
Formulated AWS Lambda functions to enable efficient, scalable back-end functionality with MongoDB database.
Optimized SEO of web apps and implemented Google Analytics tags and reporting.

title: Teaching Assistant - Software Engineering
description: Mentored students to complete a 8-month web development diploma course.
Taught students to use HTML, SASS, JavaScript, React, Node, Express, Git, SQL, AWS, and Jira to create full scale applications.
Prepared and led students through coding challenges and code reviews.
Collaborated with course educators and education experience team by providing student progress check-ins, actively participating in regular stand ups & retrospective sessions.

title: Senior Technical Analyst
description: Facilitated long term solutions using extensive product knowledge in the Advanced Accounting ERP product suite.
Used Confluence to routinely document and verify case policies/procedures to strengthen internal controls.
Performed advanced SQL queries to ensure accurate data collection and reporting.
Recognized as a top performer with experience in over 450+ Cases.
Achieved record-breaking 10 CSAT Positive Reviews in one-week.

title: E-Commerce Developer
description: Consulted and assist businesses during COVID-19 in building and optimizing their online presence.
Built websites with platforms such as Shopify, WordPress, & Square, using HTML, CSS, & JavaScript.
Led all post-launch marketing to generate brand awareness & engagement with CMS tools (HubSpot & WordPress).
Launched over 20 web stores and was recognized as a top performer.
